title: Must Read: 'Vogue' World Is Heading to Hollywood, Francesca Amfitheatrof Leaves Louis Vuitton
description: These are the stories making headlines in fashion on Thursday. In Los Angeles on Wednesday night, Anna Wintour announced that the fourth annual Vogue World event will be held in Hollywood at the Paramount Pictures Studio Lot on Oct. 26. All proceeds from ticket sales will directly benefit members ...Continue reading
author: Brooke Frischer
